 **Cassegrain**
 Jul, 2025
 ---

#### Overview 
 A hybrid web2/web3 Supply Chain Management Solution, built on Solana with Ephemeral Rollups (Magic Block ER). It aims to provide a secure, transparent, and efficient way for Manufacturers, Retailers, and Consumers to interact with supply chain data, verify product authenticity, track goods in real-time, and facilitate direct P2P transactions.
 
[Repository](https://github.com/Princeadxisrael/Cassegrain)
[Repository](https://github.com/Princeadxisrael/Cassegrain-FE)
